title: Getting S- or higher with no tokens
body: I keep getting S- minuses or higher and not getting mastery tokens for my talon {{champion:91}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
That's because you had already earned that chest with Talon.

https://i.gyazo.com/30957a9fc024e8557d7d8b01ced678de.png

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dLAcJn2A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-14T05:50:56.153+0000)
>
> That's because you had already earned that chest with Talon.
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/30957a9fc024e8557d7d8b01ced678de.png

What are u even talking about he is talking about tokens not chests?!

Tokens are linked to chests?

That doesn't sounds right.

Yeeeaaaa so this preseason might have me working a bit too fast and I misread that completely -_-'. Mastery Scores are also tied to getting mastery chests each season, so I skimmed and thought he was asking about not getting a chest instead of a token. Forgive me DX

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Why did you move the finish line for Champion advancement??? Getting a S- is hard enough, now you want players to play flawlessly??? I finally managed a S- last month and find out RIOT moved the finish line for tokens!!!!

This is ridiculous!  

The bench mark for success for a Champion should be realistic for majority of players, not some arbitrary decision to move the finish line.  The players know why you moved it, to increase play time, rob devoted players of their skill development.  This is madness!
I looked into your match history and don't see any above A+. If this isn't right, feel free to link your match history so we can double check in our Player Support tools.

Ah! Thanks for the screen.

Ascension doesn't count for getting Mastery tokens 6 or 7. These can only be received through Summoner's Rift Normal or Ranked mode.
